ideas.title: Google’s first AI glasses expected next year
ideas.description: Google is working on various types of AI-powered glasses — one model is designed for screen-free assistance, using built-in speakers, microphones, and cameras to allow the user to communicate with Gemini and take photos. The other model has an in-lens display — which is only visible to the person wearing the glasses — that can show turn-by-turn directions or closed captioning.
hooks: AI Glasses: Google's Invisible Revolution Starts Now
The Future Sits Right On Your Nose
